Name: Pre-Launch Closeout
checklistText:
<size=21>PRELAUNCH CLOSEOUT CHECK</size>


PANEL 11:
All cb's - open, except:
	CB HTR:
		RNDZ RDR STBY - close
		LDG RDR - close
	CB LTG: ANUN/DOCK/COMPNT - close
	CB PGNS: IMU STBY - close
	CB EPS:
		BAT FEED TIE (2) - close
		CROSS TIE BAL LOADS - close
		DES ECA - close
		DC BUS VOLT - close

PANEL 8:
	DES PROPUL:
		FUEL VENT sw - center; tb - bp
		OXID VENT sw - center; tb - bp
	HTR CONT:
		URINE LINE sw - OFF
	ED:
		DES PRPLNT ISOL VLV sw - SAFE
		MASTER ARM sw - OFF
		DES VENT sw - SAFE
		ASC He SEL sw - BOTH
		LDG GEAR DEPLOY sw - SAFE; tb - bp
		RCS He PRESS sw - SAFE
		DES START He PRESS - SAFE
		ASC He PRESS sw - SAFE
		STAGE sw - SAFE
		STAGE RELAY sw - OFF
	AUDIO:
		S BAND T/R sw - OFF
		ICS T/R sw - OFF
		RELAY ON sw - RELAY OFF
		S BAND VOL tw - as desired
		ICS VOL tw - as desired
		MODE sw - ICS/PPT
		AUDIO CONT sw - NORM
		VHF A sw - OFF
		VHF B sw - OFF
		VOX SENS tw - as desired
		VHF A VOL tw - as desired
		VHF B VOL tw - as desired
		MATER VOL tw - as desired
	COAS sw - OFF

	ORDEAL:
		FDAI 1 sw - INRTL
		FDAI 2 sw - INRTL
		EARTH/LUNAR sw - PWR OFF
		LTG sw - OFF
		MODE sw - HOLD/FAST
		SLEW sw - center
		ALT SET cont - TBD nm
TTCA:
	THROTTLE/JETS cont (CDR) - JETS
	Throttle friction cont (CDR) - as desired

PANEL 5:
	DES RATE sw - center
	Eng STOP pb/lt - reset
	Eng START pb/lt - not depressed
	+X TRANSL pb - not depressed
	MSN TMR:
		TMR CONT sw - STOP
		SLEW CONT HOURS sw - center
		SLEW CONT MIN sw - center
		SLEW CONT SEC sw - center
	LTG:
		OVERRIDE ANUN sw - OFF
		OVERRIDE NUM sw - OFF
		OVERRIDE INTEGRAL sw - OFF
		SIDE PANELS sw - OFF
		FLOOD cont - BRIGHT
		ANUN/NUM cont - DIM
		INTEGRAL cont - DIM

ACA:
	PPT pb (CDR) - not depressed

PANEL 1:
	X POINTER SCALE sw - HI MULT
	MASTER ALARM pb/lt - not depressed
	RATE/ERR MON sw - LDG RDR/CMPTR
	ALTITUDE MON sw - PGNS
	SHFT/TRIN sw - +/-50
	RATE SCALE sw - 25/SEC
	ACA PROP sw - ENABLE
	ENG THR CONT:
		THR CONT sw - AUTO
		MAN THROT sw - CDR
		ENG ARM sw - OFF
		ATT/TRANSL sw - 4 JETS
		BAL CPL sw - ON
	ASC He REG 1 sw - center; tb - gray
	ASC He REG 2 sw - center; tb - gray
	DES He REG 1 sw - center; tb - gray
	DES He REG 2 sw - center; tb - bp
	PRPLNT QTY MON sw - OFF
	PRPLNT TEMP/PRESS MON sw - ASC
	HELIUM MON sel - OFF
	ABORT pb - reset
	ABORT STAGE pb - reset
	RNG/ALT MON sw - ALT/ALT RT
	MODE SEL sw - LDG RADAR
	GUID CONT sw - PGNS

PANEL 3:
	ENG GMBL sw - ENABLE
	DES END CMD OVRD sw - OFF
	RADAR:
		LDG ANT sw - AUTO
		TEST sw - OFF
		TEST/MON selc - ALT XMTR
	RNDZ RADAR:
		SLEW RATE sw - HI
		SLEW sw - center
		RNDZ RADAR sel - SLEW
	S/C:
		DEAD BAND sw - MIN
		GYRO TEST sw - ROLL
		GYRO TEST POS RT sw - OFF
		ROLL sw - MODE CONT
		PITCH sw - MODE CONT
		YAW sw - MODE CONT
		PGNS sw - OFF
		AGS sw - OFF
		IMU CAGE sw - OFF
	HTR CONT:
		TEMP MON sel - LDG RADAR
		RCS SYS A/B 2 QUAD 1, 4, 2, & 3 sw - OFF
	EVENT TMR:
		RESET/COUNT UP sw - UP
		TMR CONT sw - STOP
		SLEW CONT MIN sw - center
		SLEW CONT SEC sw - center

	LTG:
		SIDE PANELS sw - OFF
		FLOOD sw - OFF
		FLOOD cont - BRIGHT
		LAMP/TONE TEST sel - OFF
		EXTERIOR LTG sw - DOCK
	X POINTER SCALE sw - HI MULT

PANEL 4:
	ACA/4 JET sw (CDR) - ENABLE
	TTCA/TRANSL sw (CDR) - ENABLE
	ACA/4 JET sw (LMP) - ENABLE
	TTCA/TRANSL sw (LMP) - ENABLE

AOT:
	Azimuth cont - CL
	AOT ind - 000.0
	Eye guard assembly & density filter - removed
	MARK X pb - not depressed
	MARK Y pb - not depressed
	REJECT pb - not depressed
	RR GYRO SEL sw - PRIM

PANEL 2:
	RCS:
		SYS A ASC FEED 1 sw - center
		SYS A ASC FEED 2 sw - center
		SYS A ASC FUEL tb - bp
		SYS A ASC OXID tb - bp
		SYS B ASC FEED 1 sw - center
		SYS B ASC FEED 2 sw - center
		SYS B ASC FUEL tb - bp
		SYS B ASC OXID tb - bp
		SYS A QUAD 1, 4, 2, & 3 sw - ENABLE; tb - gray
		SYS B QUAD 1, 4, 2, & 3 sw - ENABLE; tb - gray
		CRSFD sw - center; tb - bp
		SYS A MAIN SOV sw - center; tb - gray
		SYS B MAIN SOV sw - center; tb - gray
		TEMP/PRESS MON sel - He
	ACA PROP sw - ENABLE
	MASTER ALARM pb/lt - not depressed
	RATE/ERR MON sw - LDG RDR/CMPTR
	ATTITUDE MON - PGNS
	GLYCOL sel - PUMP 2
	SUIT FAN sel - 1
	O2/H2O QTY MON sel - ASC 2

TTCA:
	THROTTLE/JETS cont (LMP) - JETS
	Throttle friction cont (LMP) - as desired

PANEL 6:
	Eng STOP pb/lt - reset
	AGS STATUS sw - OFF

ACA:
	PPT pb (LMP) - not depressed

PANEL 16:
	All cb's - open, except:
	CB LTG: FLOOD - close
	CB S/C: ASA - close
	CB HTR:
		S BD ANT - close
	CB EPS:
		DC BUS VOLT - close
		DES ECA - close
		CROSS TIE BAL LOADS - close
		BAT FEED TIE (2) - close

PANEL 14:
	EPS:
		ED VOLTS sw - OFF
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - ED/OFF
		INVERTER sw - OFF
		LMP BAT 1 HI V & LO V sws (2) - OFF; center; tb - bp
		LMP BAT 2 sw - OFF; center; tb - bp
		CDR BAT 3 sw - OFF; center; tb - bp
		CDR BAT 4 HI V & LO V sws (2) - OFF; center; tb - bp
		CDR & LMP LUNAR BAT sws - OFF (2) - OFF; center; tb - bp
		DES BATS sw - connect; center; tb - bp
		BAT 5 NORMAL LMP FEED sw - OFF; center; tb - bp
		BAT 5 BACKUP CDR FEED sw - OFF; center; tb - bp
		BAT 6 NORMAL CDR FEED sw - OFF; center; tb - bp
		BAT 7 BACKUP LMP FEED sw - OFF; center; tb - bp
	COMM: UPLINK SQUELCH sw - ENABLE

PANEL 12:
	UP DATA LINK sw - OFF
	AUDIO:
		AUDIO CONT sw - NORM
		S BAND T/R sw - OFF
		ICS T/R sw - OFF
		RELAY ON sw - RELAY OFF
		S BAND VOL tw - as desired
		ICS VOL tw - as desired
		MODE sw - ICS/PPT
		AUDIO CONT sw - NORM
		VHF A sw - OFF
		VHF B sw - OFF
		VOX SENS tw - as desired
		VHF A VOL tw - as desired
		VHF B VOL tw - as desired
		MATER VOL tw - as desired
	COMM:
		S BAND MODULATE sw - PM
		S BAND XMTR/RCVR sw - OFF
		S BAND PWR AMPL sw - OFF
		S BAND VOICE sw - OFF
		S BAND PCM sw - OFF
		S BAND RANGE sw - OFF/RESET
		VHF A XMTR sw - OFF
		VHF A RCVR sw - OFF
		VHF B XMTR sw - OFF
		VHF B RCVR sw - OFF
		TLM BIOMED sw - OFF
		TLM PCM sw - HI
		VHF A SQUELCH tw - as desired
		VHF B SQUELCH tw - as desired
		RECORDER sw - OFF
		RECORDER TAPE tb - bp
	COMM ANT:
		VHF sel - AFT
		TRACK MODE sw - OFF
		PITCH cont - -75
		YAW cont - -12
		S BAND sel - AFT

Ovhd floodlights (CDR & LMP) - rotate aft
UTL:
	CDR & LMP UTILITY LIGHTS sw - OFF

ECS:
	SUIT GAS DIVERTER vlv - PULL EFRESS
	CABIN REPRESS vlv - CLOSE
	LO PLSS FILL vlv - CLOSE
	PRESS REG A vlv - CLOSE
	PRESS REG B vlv - CLOSE
	DES O2 vlv - CLOSE
	#1 ASC O2 vlv - CLOSE
	#2 ASC O2 vlv - CLOSE
	SUIT ISOL vlv (CDR) - SUIT DISC
	SUIT ISOL vlv (LMP) - SUIT DISC
	ASC H2O vlv - CLOSE
	SEC EVAP FLOW vlv - CLOSE
	PRI EVA FLOW vlv - CLOSE
	DES H2O vlv - CLOSE
	PRI EVAP FLOW #1 vlv - CLOSE
	WATER TANK SELECT vlv - DES
	SUIT TEMP vlv - COLD
	CABIN GAS RETURN vlv - AUTO
	SUIT CIRCUIT RELIEF vlv - AUTO
	CO2 CANISTER SEL vlv - PRIM
	PRIM CO2 CANISTER cover - CLOSE
	SEX CO2 CANISTER cover - CLOSE
	WATER SEC SEL vlv - PULL SEP 2
	Cabin relief & dump vlv (ovhd) - OPEN
	Cabin relief & dump vlv (fwd) - AUTO
	LIQUID GARMENT COOLING vlv - COLD
	HI PLSS O2 FILL vlv - CLOSE
